attributes.action: Make law that mortgages being lent cannot be more than 3 and a half times your annual salary
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We’ve all seen what happens when people borrow more than three and a half times annual salary. It’s always been three and half for a reason. Thanks to this government not taking action and greedy banks and estate agents who allowed this in the first place we are now seeing the effects of these ridiculous five times and six times your annual salary mortgages.
